tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GenderEqualityAnalysis (
  country VARCHAR,
  year INT,
  gender VARCHAR,
  discrimination_type VARCHAR,
  discrimination_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE GenderEqualityData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  country VARCHAR(50),
  year INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  equality_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE DiscriminationStats (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  country VARCHAR(50),
  year INT,
  discrimination_type VARCHAR(20),
  discrimination_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE discrimination_cases (
    case_id INT,
    country VARCHAR(255),
    discrimination_type VARCHAR(50),
    reported_by VARCHAR(100),
    reported_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE human_rights_violations (
    violation_id INT,
    country VARCHAR(255),
    violation_type VARCHAR(50),
    victim_name VARCHAR(100),
    report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE gender_equality_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
               country VARCHAR(50),
               indicator VARCHAR(100),
               year INT,
               value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE discrimination_cases (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
               case_id VARCHAR(20),
               case_description VARCHAR(255),
               case_date DATE,
               country VARCHAR(50),
               outcome VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE gender_indices (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
               index_id VARCHAR(20),
               index_name VARCHAR(100),
               index_value FLOAT,
               year INT
)

CREATE TABLE human_rights_violations (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
               violation_id VARCHAR(20),
               violation_description TEXT,
               country VARCHAR(50),
               violation_date DATE,
               status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE gender_equality_facts (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    country VARCHAR(100),
    indicator VARCHAR(100),
    value FLOAT,
    year INT
);

CREATE TABLE gender_equality_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_title VARCHAR(200),
    report_date DATE,
    author VARCHAR(100),
    summary TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE discrimination_cases (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_title VARCHAR(200),
    case_description TEXT,
    case_date DATE,
    country VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE human_rights_organizations (
    org_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    org_name VARCHAR(200),
    org_type VARCHAR(100),
    headquarters_address TEXT,
    contact_email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
    response_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_id UUID,
    question VARCHAR(200),
    answer VARCHAR(100),
    respondent_age INT
);
